title: What's up with the new web sight design?
body:
It's weird and i feel it's harder to use. 

anyway,

replies.body: I just looked at it then took me about 2 seconds to adjust I guess some people adapt slower then others *shrugs*
meh meh meh meh meh... it was like 4 am when i wrought this.
You can't even get to most parts of the website from most parts of the website anymore. It's a bit ridiculous.
